A helper module for generating dummy filler text. Presently it defines a new ipsum provider plugin manager service that allows for pluggable ipsum provider classes, making it easy to change existing implementations and also to add new ones.
A simple filler text generator generator. Use your custom sentences and create some original Lorem ipsum.
